statements: SELECT * FROM user_auth;
SELECT username, role FROM user_auth WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_auth WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_auth ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_auth WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_auth WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_auth WHERE password_hash LIKE '%abc%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM user_auth;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM user_auth WHERE user_id > 100 AND role = 'user' ORDER BY user_id DESC, username ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_auth WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE users.user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT u.username, COUNT(r.role_name) AS role_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING role_count > 1 ORDER BY role_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, date_created FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, date_created FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_mapping.role_id;

SELECT users.username, COUNT(user_role_mapping.role_id) AS role_count FROM users LEFT JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING role_count > 1;

SELECT users.username, role_permissions.permission_id FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN role_permissions ON role_permissions.role_id = user_role_mapping.role_id WHERE user_role_mapping.role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE login_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM user_roles;
SELECT permission_name FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_id IN (SELECT permission_id FROM role_permission_mapping WHERE role_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM user_role_mapping WHERE user_id = 456 AND role_id = 789;

SELECT users.username, user_permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN role_permission_mapping ON role_permission_mapping.role_id = user_role_mapping.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON role_permission_mapping.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
